website_summaries.verdict: Anyone looking for a budget-friendly ball to play for fun or begin honing skills will appreciate the way the Maxim handles. Its good looks are also a selling point for those focused on the fun of the game.
pros: An entry-level ball suited for straight bowling
Those new to the sport rave about how good it looks and how effective it is for learning the fundamentals of the game
Available in many sizes and colors
cons: Not up to the performance level of competitive bowlers, unless it's used for picking up spares

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I love this purple ball. I throw straight, so it is perfect for me. I am a fairly new bowler. The only complaint that I have is the area of the ball that was drilled for the finger holes is right where there are white swirls and the holes that are drilled are also white. I have a hard time locating the finger holes when it is my turn to bowl. I think I will need to get colored inserts that are a different color. Otherwise, performs as expected. Would buy again. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sayles

customer_reviews.title: Good Spare/Straight Ball
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed this ball. It's solid for spare and straight shooting!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowling Ball. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great Bowling Ball. Good price. My son's game has improved since getting his own ball.
customer_reviews.author: ellaina knight

customer_reviews.title: Bowling Ball
customer_reviews.text: I like the color of this ball. I needed a new bowling ball.
customer_reviews.author: Sookie

customer_reviews.title: I am totally satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am totally satisfied with this purchase. Bowling balls, like everything else, can really be costly these days. The price was great. Its also pretty.
customer_reviews.author: ANNETTE B SPRIGGS

customer_reviews.title: Love this ball and color
customer_reviews.text: Love my new ball! Got it drilled and engrave immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ichigo7x7

customer_reviews.title: Great ball at a great value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, looks beautiful & the wife likes it! What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Judahite

customer_reviews.title: Looks great rolling down the lane and was easy to drill
customer_reviews.text: Looks great rolling down the lane and was easy to drill. Got it for my brother for his birthday and his first game with it was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K

customer_reviews.title: Solid starter ball
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid ball for a novice. Don't expect to get it to hook
customer_reviews.author: TWL

customer_reviews.title: awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this bag! I throw straight and it's everything I was looking for. I would purchase again if I need it
customer_reviews.author: Jamieson K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome spare ball
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new spare ball. I had a Maxim ball so I wanted to get another. My first maxim lasted me about 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great straight ball
customer_reviews.text: It's a good straight ball, came in very glossy and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Dlx

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this bowling ball. I am bowling a lot straighter.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good beginner ball according to my bowling friends and for ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time bowling ball owner and I know nothing about balls and it’s capabilities. But for my first ball I really have no complaints. It’s a good beginner ball according to my bowling friends and for the price you can’t go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: AKD

product_meta.title: Ebonite Maxim
product_meta.description: For The Bowler Who Puts A High Priority On Bowling In Style, The Most Popular Polyester Ball In The World Is Ready To Take Your Game To The Next Level. With The Release Of Even More Exciting New Styles, Maxim Keeps You Looking Good At Any Age. Turn Down The Lights And Turn Up The Fun. Every Maxim Glow Is A Wickedly Fun Ball With The Ultraviolet Glow That Lights Up Late Night And Black Light Bowling Or Birthday Parties. Great choice for children, beginners or spare shooting.
feature_bullets: 800/800/1000/2000 Abralon Polished w/Powerhouse factory finish polish
